content.p: Associate Professor and Director of Teaching and Learning (UNM), Dr. Lim Yin-Sze completed her BSc in Bioindustry, Master in Enzyme and Food Biotechnology, and PhD in Microbial Biotechnology at the University Putra Malaysia. Her teachings include: nutrition, food microbiology, immunology and biotechnology related modules. My research focuses on the potential of food-grade lactic acid bacteria for use as probiotics in improving gastrointestinal health and the application of postbiotics, such as bacteriocins, asâ€¦ read more telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8018
